description: Rental vehicles for military personnel in Okinawa, Japan
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: OP Neon Rental Vehicles**

* Reference Number: PW-22-01008736
* Solicitation Number: W8484-230322
* Publication Date: September 29, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 4, 2022, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time

## Intent and Context
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires rental vehicles for personnel operating in Okinawa, Japan, from September 30, 2022, to November 7, 2022. Fifty personnel will need car rentals for a period of thirty-eight days.

## Requirements
* 5 full-size sedans
* 11 passenger vans
* 3 trucks with a hitch

## Contractor Responsibilities
* Provide vehicles in good condition, cleaned, and inflated
* Ensure vehicles are no more than four years old, with less than 75,000 kilometers
* Provide a spare tire with new or near-new condition
* Provide GPS units and ensure software is updated regularly
* Provide insurance covering collision damage waiver (CDW) at a flat rate and detailed in the annex
* Prepare and provide documentation for multiple drivers per vehicle

## Government Responsibilities
* Provide fuel for the vehicles
* Ensure vehicles are returned with the same quantity and type of fuel
* Contact police to file and obtain a police report for any loss, damages, or repairs to the vehicle

## Additional Requirements
* Contractor must have a local point of contact for CAF queries
* Contractor must provide replacement vehicles in the event of a breakdown or damage
* CAF will permit personnel between 21 and 24 years old to drive rental vehicles with authorized government business

## Contract Requirements
* Contract duration: 38 days
* Delivery and return location: Kadena Air Base
* Payment: as per annexed Basis of Payment
